callback_with_context.context_function_id: (x = DamagePerSecond) => { x | Format("%d - %d", RoundFloat(0.5 * x), x) }
(regen = ManaRegenMod * 100) => { regen | regen > 0 => Format("+%d%%", RoundFloat(regen)) | Format("-%d%%", RoundFloat(Abs(regen))) }

tooltip_special_ability_phase.comment: store battle unit effect here and propagate phase record so can read intensity from the effect, rather than creating tooltip then passing phase record which would not have that info

spread_parent.comment: Shows when have a spread range
